doc.title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
doc.author: Sergei Sarichev
doc.excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Jungle Deep by Sergei Sarichev

main.head: Jungle Deep
main.p: Sergei Sarichev is a freelance concept artist and illustrator focused on film, video games and cover art. He began his career by studying traditional painting on his own and a few years ago he progressed into CGI painting and design, constantly learning new techniques to tell his stories.
